contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Yamamoto'''|山本町|Yamamoto-machi}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Yamamoto District, Akita|Yamamoto District]], [[Akita Prefecture|Akita]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 8,042 and a [[population density|density]] of 82.04 persons per km². The total area is 98.02 km². On March 20, 2006, Yamamoto was merged with the towns of [[Kotooka, Akita|Koto'oka]] and [[Hachiryū, Akita|Hachiryū]], all from [[Yamamoto District, Akita|Yamamoto District]], to form the new town of [[Mitane, Akita|Mitane]]. ==External links== * [http://www.town.mitane.akita.jp/ Mitane official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Akita Prefecture]] {{Akita-geo-stub}}
